title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.8 - Driver returning to home
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 175.8 - Driver returning to home

State Regulations

Nothing in this Part prohibits an operator of a motor bus
upon completion of the statutory limit of driving time or on duty time from
returning to his home as a passenger upon a bus owned and operated by his
employer, provided that he is furnished with the same accommodations as other
passengers, and provided that after using such accommodations he goes off duty
for eight consecutive hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
175.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
